content: I'm looking to write articles and content in exchange for bitcoin. Please review a 200-word example of my work below.there's a little over 200 words but this should be enough to sample my ability to write, please let me know if you are interested in my services, I deliver completed work first and then you review and deliver payment to my bitcoin address. Updated Bitcoin casino sample article.Over the last 5 or 6 years, I've played at Bitstarz on an on-and-off basis when finances have allowed. I still remember my first time learning of them, bitcoin was still only worth around $475 a bitcoin at that time and I used a 20 free spins no deposit bonus with them my first time playing, at the time those 20 free spins were allotted to your choice of a slot game called Fruit Zen or Boomanji. I played both usually 10 of my free spins on each and ended up falling in love with these two games over time, Fruit Zen has a bonus that gives you a solid column of wilds on a single free spin that continues and expands if you're lucky enough to get another bonus symbol during the first free spin, it features fruits and relaxing music as its gameplay aesthetic. Boomanji is almost identical except it incorporates various depictions of fireworks and firework audio as its own theme. the bonus symbol is just a very satisfying-looking crate of all of the previously mentioned firework depictions. I've had highs and lows with Bitstarz at one point winning a massive 4.9 BTC( at the time fairly small value however I had only deposited around 20 MBtc to get it) one thing is for certain though, I've never seen another online casino beat the time to process a cash out with the average time being less the 8 minutes before the withdrawal becomes initiated on the blockchain.
